text: Today in this Kids Can Cook Clean video, I'l be showing you how to teach a younger child
to crack an egg and avoid getting all those little bits of egg shell in the eggs.
Mini Chef and I are making Saturday morning pancakes. You can see the bowl of flour in
the background here. It's time to add the eggs to the flour, so I gave him a separate
bowl to crack his eggs into.
Now the trick is, to have them do one egg at a time like he's doing here. He will crack
one egg and then check it for shell pieces before he empties the egg into the bowl of
flour. And just like that, they learn easily, quickly, and gain a ton of confidence in the
If you enjoyed this Kids Can Cook Clean episode from The Gracious Pantry, please like my video
and subscribe to my channel! And as always, feel free to ask any questions in a comment
